name: Senior Product Manager, AI
description:
Picsart is looking for a Senior Product Manager to join the AI unit. The ideal candidate has strong personal accountability for results, commitment to teamwork in support of the company's success. If you are strategic, tactical and are excited about driving product vision and priorities, working with nowadays technologies and scientists, guiding products from conception to launch, join our team.

Responsibilities:

  • Work closely with customers and internal stakeholders to understand their challenges, needs, and processes;
  • Work closely with Scientists, Associates and Designers on several projects;
  • Audit the state of our product suite (experiences and usage), as well as products provided by other industry leaders;
  • Drive end-to-end delivery of new product features and new products, spearhead our go-to-market strategy around them;
  • Contribute to set company-wide product strategy and explore new product ideas;
  • Collaborate closely with engineers to implement innovative, scalable product improvements;
  • Investigate and explore opportunities to use AI to deliver valuable insights to customers;
  • Understand the competitive landscape and identify ways to leverage and expand our differentiators;
  • Manage the release, communication, and measurement of new product features.

Required Qualifications:

  • BS or MA degree in Math, Economics, Statistics, Engineering, Computer Science, or another equivalent field;
  • At least 3 years of Product Management experience;
  • Exceptional data analysis skills;
  • Eager and able to take end-to-end ownership of product projects;
  • Has owned and shipped numerous high-value features;
  • Ability to provide clear direction set measurable goals, and give insight on industry trends;
  • Ability to define strategic goals and vision;
  • Thrives in a fast-paced startup environment: comfortable balancing between strategy and tactic;
  • Happy to dive deep into challenging, open-ended problems;
  • Pragmatic and team-oriented;
  • Excellent presentation skills and ability to present work to executive staff;
  • Exceptional problem solving and communication skills;
  • Advanced written and verbal English communication skills.
